description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref:P0285.25 dated 29/04/2025 to allow for alteration of front wall design with sliding gate instead of inward opening gates (Single and two storey rear extensions including raised patio, new first floor bay windows with rebuilt entrance porch and loft conversion with front and rear dormer windows and new front boundary wall(Retrospective))
decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted: change from a brick boundary wall and opening gates to a part brick / part railings wall with sliding gates (height remains the same).
The permission hereby granted does not supercede the previously imposed conditions.
